channel.title: Dom Williams
channel.description: Personal blog about Rust, gamedev, and other programmery joys.

item.title: The Bane of TODOs
item.description: TODOs are great. In my head they're short and concise notes that will remind future me about issues and outstanding work that he'll get to one day. They'll be ticked off one by one in small commits that paint a beautifully satisfying `git log`. Surely?
